ctar 0.2.3

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

ctar 0.2.3 (2024-08-28)

This minor update is mostly focused on documentation.

Bug fixes

  • 19e18b1: Fixed that placo can only accept 2 traits.
  • f406a97: Modified “z-value” to “z-score.”

Minor tweaks

  • #26: Filled in the help pages (except examples) for the main functions.
  • #26: Added in examples in help pages.
  • 1fc071c: Added one vignette.
  • 759025d: Initiated pkgdown website (https://slamballais.github.io/ctar).

ctar 0.2.2 (2024-08-27)

Bug fixes

  • 8f7a2cd: Removed unnecessary values in Imports field.
  • 0c21c9b: Make sure that R CMD CHECK is passed successfully.

Minor tweaks

  • 23d7741: Add R CMD CHECK badge for GitHub.
  • 098a69f: Updated looks of NEWS.md.
  • #24: Added codecov checks.
  • 832cf03: Added a GitHub Actions for PR commands.
  • 271d077: Modified argument names to fit lintr (e.g., .MAXVAL to maxval).
  • 56baa27: Increase the test coverage.

ctar 0.2.1 (2024-08-27)

Minor tweaks

  • #10: Added internal functions and checks for the input arguments.
  • #11: Added p_exp (-log10 p-values) to the output of cpma and fct.
  • #12: Added tests against the non-subset sumrank, cpma, and fct.
  • b9c3e56: Added tests to see if p-values are equal to 0.
  • #16: Modified z_in to z, and p_in to p. Added checks for z.

ctar 0.2.0 (2024-08-26)

Version 0.2.0 extends beyond sumrank and adds a number of necessary features.

New features

  • #1: Implemented initial testing framework.
  • a5d2280: Implemented PLACO (“pleiotropic analysis under composite null hypothesis”) as placo.
  • #6: Implemented CPMA (“cross-phenotype meta-analysis”) as cpma.
  • #8: Implemented FCT (“Fisher’s combined probability test”) as fct.

ctar 0.1.0 (2024-08-26)

This is the very first version of ctar: cross-trait associations in R. This version purely contains the necessary files to have an R package, as well as an uncleaned version of sumrank. I will add in more features soon!
